to mount vobs on a dvdr download dvd shrink 3.2 online free ,or probably on pb . shrink will allow u to strip any material u wish from the movie such as menus in unknown languages ,extras  etc. u can then compress the file to a size which will fit the dvdr.and form the vobs into 1 iso.file. Next download image burn online free. image burn will easily burn iso. or img. files to a dvdr plus a bunch of other cool stuff. i have done a ton of movies this way works great..............shrink also removes the region code.
